title: Ubiquitous Computing
description: Investigates the infrastructure required to develop mobile and ubiquitous computing applications and establishes major research themes and experimental practices. Credit not awarded for both CS 7470 and CS 4605.

prerequisites: CS 6750 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PSYC 6750 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
